resources.string: Seven Shuffle is a game. The goal is to guess as many anagrams as possible, given a set of characters. \n An anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, in this game you use between 3 to 7 of the original letters.
Heads up! Changing the theme will end any game that’s currently playing. Make sure to finish your game first.
